text: Some Kind of Wonderful is a 1987 American romantic drama movie directed by Howard Deutch and starring Eric Stoltz, Mary Stuart Masterson, Craig Sheffer, Pamela Anderson. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures and was one of several successful movies by John Hughes in the 1980s. ==Other websites== * * Category:1987 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies directed by Howard Deutch Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: Some Kind of Wonderful
